类的使用
spiglet.Token

  • 使用Token的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    spiglet  

    • spiglet中Token的使用

      声明为Token的spiglet中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      Token ParseException.currentToken
      This is the last token that has been consumed successfully.
      static Token SpigletParser.jj_nt
      Next token.
      Token Token.next
      A reference to the next regular (non-special) token from the input stream.
      Token Token.specialToken
      This field is used to access special tokens that occur prior to this token, but after the immediately preceding regular (non-special) token.
      static Token SpigletParser.token
      Current token.
      返回Token的spiglet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Token SpigletParserTokenManager.getNextToken()
      Get the next Token.
      static Token SpigletParser.getNextToken()
      Get the next Token.
      static Token SpigletParser.getToken(int index)
      Get the specific Token.
      private static Token SpigletParser.jj_consume_token(int kind) 
      protected static Token SpigletParserTokenManager.jjFillToken() 
      static Token Token.newToken(int ofKind) 
      static Token Token.newToken(int ofKind, java.lang.String image)
      Returns a new Token object, by default.
      参数类型为Token的spiglet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      private static java.lang.String ParseException.initialise(Token currentToken, int[][] expectedTokenSequences, java.lang.String[] tokenImage)
      It uses "currentToken" and "expectedTokenSequences" to generate a parse error message and returns it.
      (专用程序包) static NodeToken JTBToolkit.makeNodeToken(Token t) 
      参数类型为Token的spiglet中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ParseException(Token currentTokenVal, int[][] expectedTokenSequencesVal, java.lang.String[] tokenImageVal)
      This constructor is used by the method "generateParseException" in the generated parser.
